OOC: WOW! Welcome back!  I vaguely remember that name, you were
probably here right when I started but I'm not sure.  The last few
months we've been working on an NBW wiki that i have found to be a
really easy way to keep track of plot info. It can be reached by
searching: NBWRPG wiki   on google.   It's the first link on the list.
 :-)

the parts about the working of the group are still a bit weak, but
that should be a good plot update.   i dont think we have formal
character creation procedures right now, so anything reasonable should
be fine. I can give you current events if you need me to.. but i gotta
get off the email for now.   Welcome back!

On 3/10/07, hugar_twriker <hugar_twriker@...> wrote:
> OOC:
> I don't know how many of you remember me, but I am back.  I think it
> has been since like 4 years since I last been here.
>
> For those that don't remember me it is I Hugar, for those history buffs
> you might remember me by another name Proto_b, one of the original
> founders.
>
> As you might imagine, coming back after four years can be a huge
> overload of information.  If anyone would be kind enough to fill me it
> that would be swell.  For example, is there a homepage anymore?  How do
> I create a character?  Yadda Yadda Yadda?  It might be a lot to tell so
> in order not to create to many messages it might be best to contact me
> on yahoo messanger at hugar_twriker, MSN at kmaddo3@..., or AIM at
> thecrowlord. Of course if you want I guess you can just reply to this
> meassage.
>
> Thanks a lot,
>
> Hugar
>
>
